mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(p.amount), 0) FROM payment p LEFT JOIN reservation r ON p.reservation_id = r.reservation_id LEFT JOIN enrollment e ON p.enrollment_id = e.enrollment_id LEFT JOIN rental ren ON p.rental_id = ren.rental_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} OR e.user_id = #{userId} OR ren.user_id = #{userId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO membership (membership_id, membership_level, user_id) VALUES (#{membership_id}, #{membership_level}, #{user_id})
